Body:
As i am new user on Kaa platform. i want to know basic information about following topics.

  1. How should i register my IoT device on kaa Platform ? Is there any way to register it on your platform.

    2.I have one \Raspberry Pi\" device with temperature sensor. I want to register it on your platform.

    3.Once it is registerd i want to see some real time graphs that will shows the temperature in specific period.

Please help us.

Thanks and regrads

Please check the Kaa 0.10 documentation. There are direct answers for 1) and 2) with examples and comments.

As per 3)
column9: Kaa 0.10 does not provide graphs out of the box. You will need to use Data Collection feature
column10:
setup a Log appender of your choice and use a 3-rd party software for real time graphs (e.g. Grafana)

Again
column11:
all the above (except Grafana) is described in the documentation's Your first Kaa application.

"
